mapper.sql: select id, box_code, item_code, batch, quantity, work_order_stock_state, bill_in_detail_id, sub_inventory_id, forecast_stock_quantity,pd,exp,in_time,lock_quantity,worker_order_no from box_item
mapper.select: select bi.*,ii.item_name from box_item bi join box_info bin on bi.box_code = bin.box_code join item_info ii on bi.item_code = ii.item_code where bin.box_cell_id is not null and bin.box_state = 1 and ii.item_code = #{itemCode} order by bi.batch
select bi.* from box_item bi join task_info ti on bi.box_code = ti.box_code where ti.task_id = #{taskId}
where box_code = #{boxCode}
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from box_item where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select id,item_code,batch from box_item group by item_code,batch having count(*)>1 order by id limit 1

select bi.*,ci.s_column,ci.s_row,si.shelf_name,ii.max_pack_qty,ci.cell_id as box_cell_idgetBoxItemDtoByitemCode from box_item bi inner join box_info bii on bii.box_code = bi.box_code left join cell_info ci on ci.cell_id = bii.box_cell_id left join shelf_info si on si.shelf_id = ci.shelf_id left join item_info ii on ii.item_code = bi.item_code where bi.item_code = #{item_code} and bi.batch = #{batch} and bi.quantity > 0 and bii.box_state = 1 order by quantity,id

select bi.*, si.shelf_name, ci.s_column, ci.s_row, ci.state as cell_state, ii.item_name, ii.unit, binf.box_state, binf.box_cell_id, ii.max_pack_qty,
bid.vendor_code as supplier_code, bid.vendor_name as supplier_name, bid.bill_id,
sii.sub_inventory_code, sii.slotting, sii.sub_inventory_name, ii.inventory_item_id from box_item bi left join box_info binf on bi.box_code = binf.box_code left join cell_info ci on binf.box_cell_id = ci.cell_id left join shelf_info si on ci.shelf_id = si.shelf_id left join item_info ii on bi.item_code = ii.item_code left join bill_in_detail bid on bid.bill_in_detail_id = bi.bill_in_detail_id left join sub_inventory sii on sii.sub_inventory_id = bi.sub_inventory_id where 1=1 and bi.box_code = #{boxCode} and bi.item_code = #{itemCode} and bi.batch = #{batch} and ci.s_row = #{sRow} and ci.s_column = #{sColumn} and si.shelf_name = #{shelfName} and ii.item_name = #{itemName} and binf.box_state = #{boxState} and bi.sub_inventory_id = #{subInventoryId}
and ci.state = #{cellState} and bi.work_order_stock_state = #{workOrderStockState} and bid.vendor_code = #{supplierCode}
and bi.id in
#{id}
and bi.quantity > 0
order by bi.quantity
and bi.sub_inventory_id in (1,4) order by (case when bi.sub_inventory_id = 4 then 1 when bi.sub_inventory_id = 2 then 2 end) asc, bi.exp
and bi.sub_inventory_id in (2,4) and bi.exp < curdate() order by bi.exp
and bi.sub_inventory_id in (2,4) and bi.work_order_stock_state = 0 and binf.box_state = 1 order by (case when bi.sub_inventory_id = 4 then 1 when bi.sub_inventory_id = 2 then 2 end) asc,bi.exp,bi.quantity
and binf.box_state = 1 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,curdate(),bi.exp) <= 0 and bi.sub_inventory_id in (2,4)
order by bi.exp

select * from ( SELECT bi.item_code, ii.item_name, bid.vendor_code as supplier_code, bid.vendor_name as supplier_name, bi.pd, bi.exp, bi.batch, bi.sub_inventory_id, ii.unit, sum(bi.quantity) as quantity, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,curdate(),bi.exp) as surplus_day FROM box_item bi left join process_record pr on pr.item_code = bi.item_code and pr.batch = bi.batch and pr.exp = bi.exp and pr.sub_inventory_id = bi.sub_inventory_id left join box_info binf on bi.box_code = binf.box_code left join cell_info ci on binf.box_cell_id = ci.cell_id left join item_info ii on bi.item_code = ii.item_code left join bill_in_detail bid on bid.bill_in_detail_id = bi.bill_in_detail_id where bi.sub_inventory_id in(2,4) and pr.process_id is null group by bi.item_code,bi.batch,bi.exp having sum(bi.quantity)>0 ) as h where 1=1
and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,curdate(),h.exp) <= #{willOverdueDay}

select bi.item_code, bi.batch, sum(bi.quantity) as quantity, bi.sub_inventory_id, bi.pd, bi.exp, max(bi.in_time) as in_time, ii.item_name, ii.unit from box_item bi left join item_info ii on ii.item_code = bi.item_code where 1=1
and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,in_time,curdate()) > 4
and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,curdate(),exp) < 180
group by item_code,batch,exp having sum(quantity) > 0 order by exp

SELECT box.box_code, box.item_code, box.batch, box.quantity, box.pd, box.exp, box.in_time, c.create_time, c.transfer_memo, sii.sub_inventory_code, sii.sub_inventory_name
FROM box_item box INNER JOIN ( SELECT b.box_code, b.create_time, b.transfer_memo FROM( /*根据箱号查询转库记录中此箱最后一条转到不合格库的数据*/ SELECT max(str.transfer_id) AS transfer_id FROM subinventory_transfer_record str WHERE str.to_subinventory = 5 GROUP BY str.box_code ) a INNER JOIN subinventory_transfer_record b ON b.transfer_id = a.transfer_id ) c ON c.box_code = box.box_code LEFT JOIN sub_inventory sii ON sii.sub_inventory_id = box.sub_inventory_id WHERE 1=1
AND box.sub_inventory_id = #{subInventoryId}
AND DATE_ADD( c.create_time, INTERVAL #{unqualifiedStorageDay} DAY ) < NOW()
select sum(quantity) from box_item

select ii.item_name, bi.item_code, bi.batch, sum(bi.quantity) as quantity, bi.exp, sii.sub_inventory_code, sii.slotting, sii.sub_inventory_name, bi.sub_inventory_id, ii.inventory_item_id from box_item bi left join item_info ii on bi.item_code = ii.item_code left join sub_inventory sii on sii.sub_inventory_id = bi.sub_inventory_id where 1=1 and bi.sub_inventory_id != 1 and bi.quantity>0 and bi.sub_inventory_id = #{subInventoryId} and bi.item_code = #{itemCode} and bi.batch = #{batch} group by bi.item_code, bi.batch, bi.exp, bi.sub_inventory_id, ii.item_name, ii.inventory_item_id, sii.sub_inventory_code, sii.slotting, sii.sub_inventory_name

select bi.*, si.shelf_name, ci.s_column, ci.s_row, binf.box_cell_id from box_item bi left join box_info binf on bi.box_code = binf.box_code left join cell_info ci on binf.box_cell_id = ci.cell_id left join shelf_info si on ci.shelf_id = si.shelf_id where 1=1 and bi.box_code = #{boxCode}
